c2.name: World Source
c2.effect: **Namisen**'s maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

c4.name: Endless Flow
c4.effect: After using **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu**, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

c3.name: To Admire the Flowers
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Kyouka** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Bansui Ichiro
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Boundless Origin
c6.effect:
After using **Kamisato Art: Kyouka**, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

c1.name: Kyouka Fuushi
c1.effect: **Shunsuiken** DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

c2.name: The Auspicious
c2.effect: **Trail of the Qilin** gains 1 additional charge.

c4.name: Westward Sojourn
c4.effect:
Opponents standing within the AoE of **Celestial Shower** take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

c3.name: Cloud-Strider
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Celestial Shower** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: The Merciful
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Trail of the Qilin** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Clement
c6.effect: Using **Trail of the Qilin** causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

c1.name: Dew-Drinker
c1.effect:
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s upon hit.
A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.

c2.name: Explosive Frags
c2.effect: Being hit by **Jumpy Dumpty**'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c4.name: Sparkly Explosion
c4.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c3.name: Exquisite Compound
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jumpy Dumpty** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Nova Burst
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sparks 'n' Splash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Blazing Delight
c6.effect:
While under the effects of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When **Sparks 'n' Splash** is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

c1.name: Chained Reactions
c1.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of **Sparks 'n' Splash**'s DMG.

c2.name: Shock Effect
c2.effect:
When **Jade Screen** is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

c4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
c4.effect: **Jade Screen** increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

c3.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starshatter** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Invincible Be the Jade Screen
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jade Screen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Grandeur Be the Seven Stars
c6.effect: When **Starshatter** is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

c1.name: Piercing Fragments
c1.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

c2.name: Land Without Promise
c2.effect: The duration of the Ice Lance created by **Rites of Termination** is increased by 4s.

c4.name: Painful Grace
c4.effect:
**Ravaging Confession**'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

c3.name: The Wages of Sin
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Ravaging Confession** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Last Rites
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Rites of Termination** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Divine Retribution
c6.effect: **Rites of Termination**'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

c1.name: Unholy Revelation
c1.effect: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

c2.name: Green Resilience
c2.effect: **Lea Lotus Lamp**'s duration is increased by 3s.

c4.name: Treacle Grass
c4.effect:
After the **Lea Lotus Lamp** triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of the Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent "Verdant Overgrowth."
You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.

c3.name: Whirling Weeds
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Razorgrass Blade** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Viridian Transience
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Surgent Manifestation** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Withering Aggregation
c6.effect: The Dendro DMG Bonus of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the **Lea Lotus Lamp** is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.

c1.name: Symbiotic Creeper
c1.effect: After **Razorgrass Blade** hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 Energy for the Traveler.

c2.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
c2.effect: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

c4.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
c4.effect:
If Tartaglia is in **Foul Legacy: Raging Tide**'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

c3.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Foul Legacy: Raging Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Havoc: Obliteration** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Havoc: Annihilation
c6.effect:
When **Havoc: Obliteration** is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of **Foul Legacy: Raging Tide** is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

c1.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
c1.effect: Decreases the CD of **Foul Legacy: Raging Tide** by 20%

c2.name: A Duty to Pursue Truth
c2.effect: When using **Framing: Freezing Point Composition**, when Monsieur Verite hits 1/2/3 (or more) opponents, Charlotte's own ATK will be increased by 10%/20%/30% for 12s.

c4.name: A Responsibility to Oversee
c4.effect: When **Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation** hits an opponent marked by Snappy Silhouette or Focused Impression, it will deal 10% more DMG and restore 2 Energy to Charlotte. This restoration can be triggered 5 times every 20s.

c3.name: An Imperative to Independence
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: A Principle of Conscience
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Framing: Freezing Point Composition** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: A Summation of Interest
c6.effect: When the active character's Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent marked by **Framing: Freezing Point Composition**'s Focused Impression, Monsieur Verite will initiate a coordinated attack that deals 180% of Charlotte's ATK as AoE Cryo DMG and heals active character(s) within the AoE for 42% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 6s and both DMG and healing dealt in this way will be considered as having been done by Charlotte's Elemental Burst.

c1.name: A Need to Verify Facts
c1.effect: After **Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation** heals a character, it will mark them with Verification, which will heal them once every 2s for 80% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect lasts 6s.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.effect: While **Glacial Waltz** is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Frostgnaw** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Waltz** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.effect: **Glacial Waltz** will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.effect:
Using **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

c2.name: Special Franchise
c2.effect: When you are in combat and the **Jinni** heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

c4.name: Discretionary Supplement
c4.effect:
The character connected to the **Jinni** will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
·When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
·When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

c3.name: Wonders Never Cease
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Alcazarzaray's Exactitude** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Value for Mora
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sprinkling Weight
c6.effect:
Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon**:
·Electro Infusion.
·When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

c1.name: Additional Investment
c1.effect: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by **Troubleshooter Shots** is increased by 1.

c2.name: Impromptu Opening
c2.effect: **Riff Revolution**'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

c4.name: Wildfire Rhythm
c4.effect: **Sweeping Fervor**'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

c3.name: Double-Stop
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sweeping Fervor** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Screamin' for an Encore
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Riff Revolution** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
c6.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

c1.name: Fatal Acceleration
c1.effect:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

c2.name: Debate
c2.effect: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

c4.name: Elucidation
c4.effect:
When **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
·Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
·Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% Dendro DMG Bonus for 15s.

The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

c3.name: Negation
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Universality: An Elaboration on Form** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Sagacity
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Structuration
c6.effect:
Alhaitham gains the following effects:
· 2 seconds after **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.
· If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s. If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

c1.name: Intuition
c1.effect: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, **Universality: An Elaboration on Form**'s CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

c2.name: A Procession of Bonfires
c2.effect:
When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

c4.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
c4.effect: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, **Niwabi Fire-Dance**'s CD is decreased by 1.2s.

c3.name: Trickster's Flare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Niwabi Fire-Dance** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Ryuukin Saxifrage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
c6.effect: During **Niwabi Fire-Dance**, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

c1.name: Agate Ryuukin
c1.effect:
The Aurous Blaze created by **Ryuukin Saxifrage** lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

c2.name: Lady of Seafoam
c2.effect: Decreases the CD of **Icetide Vortex**'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

c4.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
c4.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

c3.name: Lawrence Pedigree
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Illumination** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Chivalric Quality
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Icetide Vortex** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Noble Obligation
c6.effect: Lightfall Swords created by **Glacial Illumination** start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

c1.name: Tidal Illusion
c1.effect:
Every time **Icetide Vortex**'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c2.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
c2.effect: When **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

c4.name: Sentinel Oath
c4.effect: Shortens the Hold CD of **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

c3.name: Hunter's Supplication
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Heterochromatic Gaze
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Overflow
c6.effect:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals AoE Hydro DMG equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

c1.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
c1.effect: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** is increased by 3s.

c2.name: Niban: Isle Amidst White Waves
c2.effect:
When in the **Windfavored** state, **Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays** will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

c4.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
c4.effect:
When casting **Hanega: Song of the Wind**, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

c3.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Hanega: Song of the Wind** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
c6.effect:
When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the **Windfavored** state, the following effects will occur:
·Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
·When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

c1.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
c1.effect:
When in the **Windfavored** state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

c2.name: Ominous Rainfall
c2.effect:
Increases the **Blood Blossom** DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, **Spirit Soother** will also apply the **Blood Blossom** effect.

c4.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
c4.effect: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a **Blood Blossom** that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

c3.name: Lingering Carmine
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Guide to Afterlife** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Floral Incense
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Soother** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Butterfly's Embrace
c6.effect:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, her All Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c1.name: Crimson Bouquet
c1.effect: While in a **Paramita Papilio** state activated by **Guide to Afterlife**, Hu Tao's Charged Attacks do not consume Stamina.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.effect:
Holding **Violet Arc** has the following effects:
·Increases DEF by 25%.
·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.effect: **Lightning Rose** now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lightning Rose** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Violet Arc** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.effect:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of **Violet Arc**'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.effect:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding **Violet Arc**.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Oil Meets Fire
c2.effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c4.name: Slowbake
c4.effect: **Pyronado**'s duration is increased by 40%.

c3.name: Deepfry
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Pyronado** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Guoba Mad
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Guoba Attack** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Condensed Pyronado
c6.effect: For the duration of **Pyronado**, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

c1.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
c1.effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

c2.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
c2.effect: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

c4.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
c4.effect: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

c3.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lemniscatic Wind Cycling** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Bane of All Evil** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
c6.effect: While under the effects of **Bane of All Evil**, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of **Lemniscatic Wind Cycling**, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

c1.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
c1.effect: Increases **Lemniscatic Wind Cycling**'s charges by 1.

c2.name: Centered Spirit
c2.effect: **Divine Maiden's Deliverance** lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

c4.name: Insight
c4.effect:
When characters under the effect of **Icy Quill** applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
· When Shenhe uses **Spring Spirit Summoning**, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
· Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

c3.name: Seclusion
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spring Spirit Summoning** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Divine Attainment
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Divine Maiden's Deliverance** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Mystical Abandon
c6.effect: When characters trigger **Icy Quill**'s effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

c1.name: Clarity of Heart
c1.effect: **Spring Spirit Summoning** can be used 1 more time.

c2.name: A Subordinate's Skills
c2.effect: **Crimson Ooyoroi**'s duration is increased by 3s.

c4.name: Long-Term Planning
c4.effect: After using **Crimson Ooyoroi**, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

c3.name: Fortified Resolve
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Blazing Blessing** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Raging Wildfire
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Crimson Ooyoroi** by 3.

Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Shining Miracle♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Gleeful Songs
c1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

c2.name: Uprising Whirlwind
c2.effect: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

c4.name: Cherishing Breezes
c4.effect: Reduces DMG taken while casting **Palm Vortex** by 10%.

c3.name: Sweeping Gust
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gust Surge** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Vortex Stellaris
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Palm Vortex** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Intertwined Winds
c6.effect:
Targets who take DMG from **Gust Surge** have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Raging Vortex
c1.effect: **Palm Vortex** pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

c2.name: Overzealous Intellect
c2.effect: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by **The Wind's Secret Ways** is increased by 6s.

c4.name: Divine Comprehension
c4.effect:
The vortex created by **Pressurized Collapses** will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

c3.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Wind Realm of Nasamjnin** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Wonderland of Rumination
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **The Wind's Secret Ways** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
c6.effect: Characters affected by **The Wind's Secret Ways**' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal Anemo DMG. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

c1.name: Truth by Any Means
c1.effect: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under the effect of a single Manifest Gale created by **Wind Realm of Nasamjnin**.

c2.name: "A Woman Adapts Like Duckweed in Water"
c2.effect: While **Let the People Rejoice** lasts, Furina's Fanfare gain from increases or decreases in nearby characters' HP is increased by 250%. Each point of Fanfare above the limit will increase Furina's Max HP by 0.35%. Her maximum Max HP increase is 140%.

c4.name: "They Know Not Life, Who Dwelt in the Netherworld Not!"
c4.effect: When the Salon Members from **Salon Solitaire** hit an opponent, or the Singer of Many Waters restores HP to the active character, Furina will restore 4 Energy. This effect triggers once every 5s.

c3.name: "My Secret Is Hidden Within Me, No One Will Know My Name"
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Let the People Rejoice** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: "His Name I Now Know, It Is...!"
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Salon Solitaire** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
c6.effect:
When using **Salon Solitaire**, Furina gains "Center of Attention" for 10s.
Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks are converted into Hydro DMG which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. DMG is also increased by an amount equivalent to 18% of Furina's max HP.
Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attacks, and the impact of Plunging Attacks will cause different effects up to every 0.1s after hitting opponents depending on her current Arkhe alignment:

Arkhe: Ousia
Every 1s, all nearby characters in the party will be healed by 4% of Furina's max HP, for a duration of 2.9s. Triggering this effect again will extend its duration.
Arkhe: Pneuma
This Normal Attack (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attack, or Plunging Attack ground impact DMG will be further increased by an amount equivalent to 25% of Furina's max HP. When any of the attacks mentioned previously hit an opponent, all nearby characters in the party will consume 1% of their current HP.

During the duration of each instance of "Center of Attention," the above effects can be triggered up to 6 times. "Center of Attention" will end when its effects have triggered 6 times or when the duration expires.

c1.name: "Love Is a Rebellious Bird That None Can Tame"
c1.effect:
When using **Let the People Rejoice**, Furina will gain 150 Fanfare.
Additionally, Furina's Fanfare limit is increased by 100.

c2.name: Innocent
c2.effect: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by **Moonjade Descent**, if White Jade Radish explosions hit opponents, 3 Energy will be restored to Yaoyao. This form of Energy regeneration can occur once every 0.8s.

c4.name: Winsome
c4.effect: After using **Raphanus Sky Cluster** or **Moonjade Descent**, Yaoyao's Elemental Mastery will be increased based on 0.3% of her Max HP for 8s. The maximum Elemental Mastery she can gain this way is 120.

c3.name: Loyal and Kind
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Raphanus Sky Cluster** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Compassionate
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Moonjade Descent** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Beneficent
c6.effect:
For every 2 White Jade Radishes **Yuegui: Throwing Mode** throws out, the next throw will also release a Mega Radish that will have a larger AoE than the standard White Jade Radish and have the following effects upon exploding:
·Deals AoE Dendro DMG based on 75% of Yaoyao's ATK.
·Restores HP for the active character based on 7.5% of Yaoyao's Max HP.

Every Yuegui: Throwing Mode can throw out a maximum of 2 Mega Radishes.

c1.name: Adeptus' Tutelage
c1.effect: When **White Jade Radishes** explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% Dendro DMG Bonus for 8s and have 15 Stamina restored to them. This form of Stamina Restoration can only be triggered every 5s.

c2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.effect:
**Skyward Sonnet** decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by **Skyward Sonnet** suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Wind's Grand Ode** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Skyward Sonnet** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Storm of Defiance
c6.effect:
Targets who take DMG from **Wind's Grand Ode** have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Splitting Gales
c1.effect: Fires 2 additional arrows per **Aimed Shot**, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect:
Using a Normal Attack as the second attack of **Passion Overload**'s Charge Level 1 will perform a follow-up attack.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Passion Overload** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fantastic Voyage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures With Me
c6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside **Fantastic Voyage**'s radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: **Fantastic Voyage**'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Egress Prep
c2.effect:
**Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash** gains the following effects:
·DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Press Mode increased by 3.3%.
·Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

c4.name: Skiving: New and Improved
c4.effect:
Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

c3.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Speed Comes First
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sleep O'Clock
c6.effect:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's **Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry** will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
·Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum DMG increase of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
·Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

c1.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
c1.effect: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by **Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry** will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.effect: **Stormbreaker**'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.effect: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tidecaller** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stormbreaker** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of Evil
c6.effect: During the duration of **Stormbreaker**, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.effect:
When **Stormbreaker** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
c2.effect:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal Hydro DMG to an opponent, that opponent's Hydro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their Dendro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "Court of Dancing Petals" Talent.

c4.name: Fricative Pulse
c4.effect: After the third dance step of **Dance of Haftkarsvar**'s Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her **Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring** will be increased by 50% for 8s.

c3.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Twirling Light
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dance of Haftkarsvar** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
c6.effect:
For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.

c1.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
c1.effect:
**Dance of Haftkarsvar** will be enhanced as follows:
·Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
·The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

c2.name: Steelbreaker
c2.effect: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents' DEF.

c4.name: Pledge of Propriety
c4.effect: When the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

c3.name: Shinkage Bygones
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Shogun's Descent
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Transcendence: Baleful Omen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wishbearer
c6.effect:
While in the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s and can trigger a total of 5 times during Musou Isshin's duration.

c1.name: Ominous Inscription
c1.effect: **Chakra Desiderata** will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

c2.name: The Root of All Fullness
c2.effect:
Opponents that are marked by **Seeds of Skandha** applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
·Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG they receive can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
·Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

c4.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
c4.effect: When 1/2/3/4 (or more) nearby opponents are affected by **All Schemes to Know**'s Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

c3.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **All Schemes to Know** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Illusory Heart** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
c6.effect:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by **All Schemes to Know**'s Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing **Illusory Heart**, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.

c1.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
c1.effect: When the **Shrine of Maya** is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

c2.name: Devourer of All Sins
c2.effect: When **Nightrider** is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

c4.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
c4.effect:
When **Midnight Phantasmagoria** is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

c3.name: Wings of Nightmare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Nightrider** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Against the Fleeing Light
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Midnight Phantasmagoria** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Evernight Raven
c6.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs coordinated attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

c1.name: Gaze of the Deep
c1.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a coordinated attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

festeringdesire.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0} and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by {1}.
festeringdesire.name: Festering Desire

athousandfloatingdreams.effect: Party members other than the equipping character will provide the equipping character with buffs based on whether their Elemental Type is the same as the latter or not. If their Elemental Types are the same, increase Elemental Mastery by {0}. If not, increase the equipping character's DMG Bonus from their Elemental Type by {1}. The aforementioned effects can have 3 stacks. Additionally, all nearby party members other than the equipping character will have their Elemental Mastery increased by {2}. Multiple such effects from multiple such weapons can stack.
athousandfloatingdreams.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams

thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.effect: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by {0} for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers

polarstar.effect: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by {0}. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by {1}. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.
polarstar.name: Polar Star

missivewindspear.effect: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by {0} and Elemental Mastery is increased by {1}.
missivewindspear.name: Missive Windspear

finaleofthedeep.effect: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by {0} for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of {1} ATK will be gained based on {2} of the total amount of the Life Bond cleared, lasting for 15s.
finaleofthedeep.name: Finale of the Deep

ferrousshadow.effect: When HP falls below {0}, increases Charged Attack DMG by {1} and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.
ferrousshadow.name: Ferrous Shadow

wineandsong.effect: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by {0} for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {1} for 5s.
wineandsong.name: Wine and Song

eyeofperception.effect: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing {0} ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every {1}.
eyeofperception.name: Eye of Perception

tidalshadow.effect: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by {0} for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
tidalshadow.name: Tidal Shadow

thedockhandsassistant.effect: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Stoic's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Roused effect will be granted for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain {0} Elemental Mastery, and 2s after the effect occurs, {1} Energy per Symbol consumed will be restored for said character. The Roused effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.
thedockhandsassistant.name: The Dockhand's Assistant

darkironsword.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {0} for 12s.
darkironsword.name: Dark Iron Sword

thebell.effect: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {0} of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every {1}. While protected by a shield, the character gains {2} increased DMG.
thebell.name: The Bell

blackcliffagate.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffagate.name: Blackcliff Agate

blackcliffpole.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffpole.name: Blackcliff Pole

fruitoffulfillment.effect: Obtain the "Wax and Wane" effect after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, gaining {0} Elemental Mastery while losing 5% ATK. For every 0.3s, 1 stack of Wax and Wane can be gained. Max 5 stacks. For every 6s that go by without an Elemental Reaction being triggered, 1 stack will be lost. This effect can be triggered even when the character is off-field.
fruitoffulfillment.name: Fruit of Fulfillment

elegyfortheend.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {0}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {1} and increases ATK by {2}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.
elegyfortheend.name: Elegy for the End

prototyperancour.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
prototyperancour.name: Prototype Rancour

kitaincrossspear.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {1} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
kitaincrossspear.name: Kitain Cross Spear

mistsplitterreforged.effect: Gain a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a {1} Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of the Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.
mistsplitterreforged.name: Mistsplitter Reforged

staffofhoma.effect: HP increased by {0}. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {1} of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional {2} of Max HP.
staffofhoma.name: Staff of Homa

mailedflower.effect: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by {0} and {1} respectively.
mailedflower.name: Mailed Flower

memoryofdust.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
memoryofdust.name: Memory of Dust

moonpiercer.effect: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character {0} ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.
moonpiercer.name: Moonpiercer

compoundbow.effect: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {0} and Normal ATK SPD by {1} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
compoundbow.name: Compound Bow

songofstillness.effect: After the wielder is healed, they will deal {0} more DMG for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
songofstillness.name: Song of Stillness

staffofthescarletsands.effect: The equipping character gains {0} of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain {1} of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.
staffofthescarletsands.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands

emeraldorb.effect: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by {0} for 12s.
emeraldorb.name: Emerald Orb

favoniuslance.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.
favoniuslance.name: Favonius Lance

lithicspear.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {0} ATK increase and a {1} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
lithicspear.name: Lithic Spear

aquasimulacra.effect: HP is increased by {0}. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by {1}. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.
aquasimulacra.name: Aqua Simulacra

magicguide.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {0}.
magicguide.name: Magic Guide

otherworldlystory.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {0} HP.
otherworldlystory.name: Otherworldly Story

blackcliffslasher.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffslasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher

hakushinring.effect: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.
hakushinring.name: Hakushin Ring
